title: Is it sunnah to wear White Clothes? Does it include Cream & Off White as well #assim assim al hakeem
transcript: sh so you know about the Hadith which is encouraging us to wear white yes um so would off-white or cream colors uh work uh like would they do the job as well if it is considered to be white then yes off cream is usually described as white if seen from a distance when you want to segregate between it and Pure White you would say off cream so yeah this is inshallah considered to be white as well
